name: CoinTracker
headline: The gold standard in cryptocurrency portfolio tracking and taxes
description: [CoinTracker](https://www.cointracker.io) makes cryptocurrency portfolio tracking and tax compliance simple. CoinTracker enables consumers and businesses to seamlessly track their cryptocurrency portfolio, investment performance, taxes, and more. We are a globally distributed team on a mission to enable everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind. [Learn more](https://www.notion.so/cointracker/CoinTracker-is-Hiring-7308c712493940a3b6e62257d283dad8) about our mission, culture, and hiring process.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: CoinTracker**

Founded in 2017 and part of Y Combinator's W18 batch, CoinTracker has positioned itself as the go-to platform for cryptocurrency portfolio tracking and tax compliance. Based in San Francisco, this company has a dedicated team of about 70 employees all working towards a clear mission: to help everyone navigate the complexities of cryptocurrency with peace of mind.

**Mission and Vision**  
CoinTracker aims to set "the gold standard" in cryptocurrency portfolio tracking and taxes, simplifying what can often be a convoluted process. They provide users—both individual consumers and businesses—with the tools they need to seamlessly track their investments, measure performance, and ensure tax compliance without undue stress.

**Key Offerings**  
1. **Portfolio Tracking**: CoinTracker pulls together user transactions from over 500 supported exchanges and wallets, helping them understand their crypto performance.
2. **Tax Compliance**: The platform automates tax calculations, allowing users to file directly with services like TurboTax and H&R Block.
3. **Comprehensive Coverage**: It supports over 10,000 crypto assets and automatically categorizes transactions, including those from DeFi, ensuring accuracy in what could otherwise be a daunting task.

**User Experience**  
With over 2.5 million users, CoinTracker is designed for efficiency. The platform emphasizes speed, ease of use, and security. Users appreciate the automation that minimizes the manual entry typically associated with tax reporting.

**Community and Partnerships**  
CoinTracker has built strong partnerships with major players, including Coinbase, TurboTax, H&R Block, Uniswap, and others. This collaborative approach not only enhances its credibility but also enriches the user experience by leveraging existing systems.

**Market Recognition**  
CoinTracker has garnered positive feedback for its user-friendly interface and robust customer support, often being hailed as a leader in the cryptocurrency tax product space, particularly as of 2024.

**Conclusion**  
In an increasingly complex world of cryptocurrency transactions, CoinTracker stands out by making tax compliance straightforward while safeguarding user data. Whether you're a seasoned trader or a newcomer to the crypto space, CoinTracker equips you with the tools to manage your investments effectively and ensure that your tax obligations are met confidently. Check them out at [CoinTracker.com](https://cointracker.com) for more information.
